meanings.definition: An unborn offspring of a mammal, in particular an unborn human baby more than eight weeks after conception.
meanings.sent1: The ultrasound showed the fetus growing inside the mother.
meanings.sent2: The doctor carefully monitored the fetus during the pregnancy.
meanings.sent3: The fetus seemed to be dancing during the sonogram!
meanings.sent4: Her love for the fetus was as deep as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The tiny fetus was a precious miracle in the making.

meanings.definition: A developing human from usually two months after conception to birth.
meanings.sent1: The fetus was kicking inside the womb.
meanings.sent2: The parents eagerly awaited the arrival of the fetus.
meanings.sent3: The fetus must be having a cozy nap in there!
meanings.sent4: Her dreams cradled the fetus like a fragile flower.
meanings.sent5: The growth of the fetus was a beautiful journey to behold.
